name: para_id
description: Para ID of the parachain representing this asset

name: asset
description: JSON String representation of the asset

name: currency_id
description: Currency ID / Asset ID of asset, if provided in assets, tokens or some other chain pallet

name: symbol
description: Human readable string token (e.g. DOT, ETH, USDC, DAI, ...)

name: xcm_interior_key
description: XCM Interior Key (v2 style) -- can be mapped directly to xcmassets

name: xc_contract_address
description: Precompiled xcContract Address of asset, if available (on EVM Chains only)
